meanings.sent2: The author's talent for crafting epigrammatisms was evident in every chapter.
meanings.sent3: During the debate, his epigrammatisms added a touch of humor to the serious discussion.
meanings.sent4: His epigrammatisms were like little gems scattered throughout his writing.
meanings.sent5: I always remember his epigrammatisms because they are so clever and memorable.
